title: Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Course Based on International Relations Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Smartphone-Based Learning Environment with Limited Real-Time Interaction, Optimized for Discussion and Role-Play Simulations

learning_goals: Learners can present cases where they applied three or more negotiation strategies through international organization decision-making simulations.
Learners can explain role-specific positions in multilateral negotiations with 80% accuracy after analyzing geopolitical conflict scenarios.
Learners can write a one-page A4 policy proposal using simulation materials uploaded on digital platforms.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
